animeDescription: Everyday salary man Shimano Yuji meets and beds a pretty young girl at his bachelor party. Meeting her again at his wedding, he realises that he has just began an affair with his sister-in-law.  (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Fujiyama Fusanobu', ['Sound Director']], ['Terada Kenji', ['Script']], ['Taniguchi Moriyasu', ['Animation Director', 'Character Design']], ['Yuzuki Hikaru', ['Original Creator']]]
